snippet: The idea is to bring emotion back into online travel, Orbitz executives say, as a way to differentiate Orbitz from competitors like Expedia and Travelocity and speak about something other than price.
abstract: The idea is to bring emotion back into online travel, Orbitz executives say, as a way to differentiate Orbitz from competitors like Expedia and Travelocity and speak about something other than price.

headline.main: In New Ad Campaign, Orbitz Comes Out as Pro-Vacation
